title: RITO BROOOOO YOUR SERVERS BROOOOOOOOOO JESUSSSSSS
body:
Was just in a game (that we were winning by the way). Where EVERYONE experienced a sudden hit of lag and everyone just dced. I tried to reconnect and it won't even let me rejoin the game.

EDIT: THE GAME ISN'T EVEN IN MY MATCH HISTORY! IT WASN'T A VICTORY/DEFEAT OR LOSS PREVENTED IT'S JUST NON EXISTENT. IT WAS JUST A WASTE OF MY TIME.

replies.body:
We do experience game server issues like you are reporting from time to time. We monitor 24x7 and look into each incident where something appears off. We are also aware that some players look to use unfair advantages in game, and we look at all angles when a disruption occurs for only a few players, while the rest is running smoothly.

I promise we will investigate this incident and determine rootcause. We don't see anything widespread ongoing but I do understand that you had a terrible experience in your game and I'm sorry for that. I know it's extra painful when you were about to get a victory.

TL;DR - our team is investigating and taking action as needed.
The reply and acknowledgement is much appreciated :-) It's enough to know you guys are at least looking into it :-)
